name: Stoneplate Enchant
active: Stoneplate: Gain 40% damage reduction but deal 60% less damage for 2.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).
description: Boot enchantment that provides resistances and an active that grants massive damage reduction at the cost of damage output.
tips: Great for champions who want to maximize their damage output
Synergizes well with other damage items for burst potential
Consider building this when ahead to snowball your advantage
Provides unique utility that can change fight dynamics
The active/passive effect creates opportunities for your team
